title.narrative: ‘Speak out!’ - Addressing sexual and reproductive health rights and gender based violence in Rwanda

description.narrative: The Speak out! project is addressing SRHR and GBV in Rwanda with the main goal to support 5,600 girls, community members in 9 sectors, and 14 women's rights organisations to have increased willingness, confidence and ability to report and respond to cases of violence in the Karongi, Nyanza, Gisagara, and Nyaruguru districts in Rwanda.
